review: Awesome! Just wished I would have done this sooner.  Signed up with Sling TV and received the fire stick at no cost.  I wish I had just ordered the fire stick and saved myself some money.  I don't care for Sling TV at all!  You have to pay $3.99 and up to watch a movie and the TV channels are sparse.  It also screwed up my video settings on my HULU and Netflix accounts.  Would not recommend Sling TV to anyone. The fire stick is a MUST HAVE :)
